name: Horror Pacman - UE4 Student Group Project
name_original: Horror Pacman - UE4 Student Group Project
description:
A game made by me and other students in UE4.

The stuff I made include:
- The Pumpkin collectible (Modeling, UV, Textures)
- Pumpkin 2D sprite
- Minimap function
- The ghost masks (Modeling, UV, Textures)
- Pause screen

Pacman is the property of Bandai Namco.
